name: Web Search and Browsing
description: Web search capabilities using Brave Search API and web browsing tools

configuration: Get a Brave Search API key from https://api.search.brave.com/
Puppeteer will download Chromium automatically on first use

brave-search.name: brave_web_search
brave-search.description: Search the web using Brave Search API

puppeteer.name: puppeteer_screenshot
puppeteer.description: Take a screenshot of a webpage

puppeteer.name: puppeteer_click
puppeteer.description: Click an element on a webpage

puppeteer.name: puppeteer_type
puppeteer.description: Type text into an input field

puppeteer.name: puppeteer_extract
puppeteer.description: Extract text or data from a webpage

notes: Brave Search requires an API key - keep it secure
Fetch server can access any URL - be cautious with sensitive sites
Puppeteer runs a full browser - resource intensive
Consider rate limiting for API calls
